item.description:
With probably our last 80 degree weather, let's get out there and do some biking as well as apple picking (or some variation of that) 

Frankly, I think the apple picking places should pay us to pick the apples!

Depending on the group consensus, we may just go for the cider and donuts and let the biking be the main event!

We plan to do 30 miles of biking at an average pace of 12-14 mph.

Here's the que sheet:

http://www.crw.org/CueSheets/cues2htm.php?id=289

 

Thanks,

Rob

 

Thanks again to our sponsor - JRA Cycles of Medford
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the event is 617-894-8454
item.name: Biking and Apple Picking Stuff - Supposed to be 81 degrees!
